TherapyBooking.title: Bloom therapy
TherapyBooking.introduction: Bumble has partnered with Bloom to offer you free, confidential support. Bloom connects you to a therapist who can offer tailored support. You'll have access to six, hour-long sessions with a therapist of your choice.
TherapyBooking.bookingDescription1: You have <strongText>4</strongText> therapy sessions available to book.
TherapyBooking.illustrationHorizontalLeaf: Illustration of two leaves joined with a rose
TherapyBooking.step2: View and select therapists (if several are available)
TherapyBooking.step3: Choose a date and time that suits you.
TherapyBooking.step4: Confirm your details and the appointment.
